workflow.name: Smart human takeover & auto pause AI-powered Facebook Messenger chatbot
workflow.description:
![nguyenthieutoann8nworkflowfacebookmessenger 3.jpeg](fileId:3783)

# ü§ñ Facebook Messenger Chatbot - Smart Human Takeover, Auto Pause & Context-Aware
## Adaptable to n8n 1.113+ and 2.x
**by Nguyen Thieu Toan (Jay Nguyen)**

---

## üìñ Overview

An **intelligent Facebook Messenger chatbot** that automatically detects human agent intervention and pauses AI responses accordingly. Features smart pause management, full context preservation, and seamless handoff between AI and human support.

**Perfect for:**
- üíº Customer support with AI + human escalation
- üéØ Sales conversations requiring manual intervention
- üõ†Ô∏è Technical support needing human expertise
- ü§ù Any chatbot requiring human oversight capability

**Requirements:** n8n v1.113.0+, Facebook App with Messenger, Google Gemini API key (or compatible LLM)

---
## üîó Complementary Workflow  
[Smart Facebook Messenger Chatbot ‚Äì Message Batching & History](https://n8n.io/workflows/9192)

Enhances Messenger automation with intelligent batching, conversation tracking, and context-aware responses.  
Messages are grouped, stored, and processed with full history for smoother interactions.

**Why combine?**  
- üß© **Smart Batch (v3)**: Efficient multi-message handling, reduced spam  
- üìú **Conversation History**: Maintains context across sessions  
- ü§ñ **AI Responses**: Natural, context-aware replies  
- ‚ö° **Scalability**: Sequential processing for reliable delivery  

üëâ Access workflow
[Smart Facebook Messenger Chatbot ‚Äì Message Batching & History](https://n8n.io/workflows/9192)

---

## ‚ö° Key Features

### **Core Capabilities**

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| üîç **Human Takeover Detection** | Automatically detects when admin/human sends messages from page via metadata checking |
| ‚è∏Ô∏è **Smart Auto-Pause** | Bot pauses for configurable duration (default 60s) when human joins conversation |
| üìù **Context Preservation** | Saves both AI and human responses in conversation history for seamless continuity |
| üìã **Whitelist Management** | Tracks paused users with timestamp-based auto-resume (no manual intervention needed) |
| üîÑ **Seamless Handoff** | Smooth transition between AI and human, then automatic resume after timeout |
| üè¢ **Multi-Page Support** | Single workflow handles multiple Facebook Pages via `page_id` differentiation |
| üìä **Full History Context** | AI sees both previous AI and human responses when resuming |

### **Technical Highlights**

- ‚úÖ Metadata-based detection (`message.metadata == "bot_rep"`)
- ‚úÖ Timestamp-based pause management (auto-expires)
- ‚úÖ Upsert operation for whitelist (updates if exists, inserts if new)
- ‚úÖ Composite key indexing (`user_id` + `page_id`)
- ‚úÖ Zero manual cleanup required
- ‚úÖ Full conversation context preserved across handoffs

---

## üèóÔ∏è How It Works

                         ‚Üì

‚îÇ 4. Automated Response                                    ‚îÇ

‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò

user.bio: An AI Automation consultant and system builder specializing in business workflow optimization with n8n. As the Founder of GenStaff, Toan empowers teams to automate complex processes using no-code/low-code tools and AI Agents, making operations smarter and more efficient. He actively shares expertise and tutorials about n8n, AI, and automation on his blog and social channels.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
